properties.name: view
properties.description:
This forcefully sets the view of the datepicker without respecting the orientation of the device.
Available options: `vertical`, `horizontal`.

properties.name: theme
properties.description:
This is used to set a theme for the datepicker. By default, the `light-theme` is applied.
Other options are `dark-theme`, `goog-theme`.

properties.name: firstDayOfWeek
properties.description: First Day of the week. Numbered days: `0 (Sun)` to `6 (Sat)`.

properties.name: disableDays
properties.description:
Arrays of days need to be disabled for selection, numbered from
`0 (Sun)` to `6 (Sat)`. Eg. weekends, `disable-days="[0, 6]"`.

properties.name: disableDates
properties.description: Array of dates need to be disabled for selection.

properties.name: minDate
properties.description:
Minimum date for selection. Dates that are smaller than the minimum
date will be disabled for selection.

properties.name: maxDate
properties.description:
Maximum date for selection. Dates that are larger than the maximum
date will be disabled for selection.

properties.name: format
properties.description: Format for the selected date. Default to `yyyy/mm/dd`. Eg. `2017/05/17`.

properties.name: date
properties.description: Selected date in the default format of `yyyy/mm/dd`. Eg. `2017/05/17`.

properties.name: inputDate
properties.description: inputDate accepts a standard date string. It will reflect the change to update the internal.

properties.name: noAnimation
properties.description: If true, no animation and transition on all elements.

properties.name: pageEntryAnimation
properties.description: Custom animation effect property when the page enters.

properties.name: pageExitAnimation
properties.description: Custom animation effect when the page exits.

properties.name: showLongDate
properties.description: Selected date will be formatted into long date. Eg. `Fri, May 12 2017`.

properties.name: invalidDate
properties.description: To indicate the input date is in an invalid format hence no date change is applied. Only use this with inputDate property.

properties.name: autoUpdateDate
properties.description: Auto update the `date` property when changed.

properties.name: alwaysResetSelectedDateOnDialogClose
properties.description: Always reset selected date on dialog close. See https://github.com/motss/app-datepicker/issues/74.

methods.name: _computeDaysOfMonth
methods.description: Compute the days for a month.

methods.name: _computeShiftedDisableDays
methods.description: / Re-compute disable days with firstDayOfWeek.

methods.name: _incrementMonth
methods.description: Increment the month via user interaction.

methods.name: _decrementMonth
methods.description: Decrement the month via user interaction.

methods.name: _computeActiveMonthYear
methods.description: Re-compute active month year if new date is selected.

methods.name: _computeShortSelectedDate
methods.description: Re-compute short version of full date to show on the picker.

methods.name: _chooseDaysOfMonth
methods.description: When a day of month is selected, a lot of tasks need to be carried out.

methods.name: _isToday
methods.description: Re-compute class when the item (day of month) is today's date.

methods.name: _isEmptyDate
methods.description: Re-compute class when the item (day of month) is empty date & non-selectable.

methods.name: _isChosenDaysOfMonth
methods.description: Re-compute class if the item (day of month) is the selected date.

methods.name: _isDisableDays
methods.description: Re-compute class if the item (day of month) is a disable day.

methods.name: _isListOfYearsSelected
methods.description: Re-compute class when a year is selected at year page.

methods.name: _computeChosenDaysOfMonth
methods.description: via user interaction.

methods.name: _convertDateStringToDateObject
methods.description: Convert date string into date object.

methods.name: _updateList
methods.description: Dynamically load items into the iron-list when switching page to year view.

methods.name: _onAnimationFinish
methods.description: hardcoded with fixed length of #items.

methods.name: _onIronSelectorSelectedChanged
methods.description: When first time switching page to year view, dynamically render iron-list.

methods.name: _computeSeparateFormat
methods.description: split capturing group of format into year, month and date.

methods.name: _bindSelectedFulldate
methods.description: bind the selected date so that it's ready to be read from the outside world.

methods.name: _updateBindDate
methods.description: method for content tag (eg. buttons).

methods.name: _computeShowLongDate
methods.description: Update date to show long date or short date.

methods.name: _updateToReflectExternalChange
methods.description: http://dygraphs.com/date-formats.html

methods.name: enforceDateChange
methods.description:
By default, buttons are required so that they are to confirm the date change.
This method allows force update the datepicker when there are no buttons inside the datepicker to confirm date change.

methods.name: resetDate
methods.description: reset date to today's date if alwaysResetSelectedDateOnDialogClose is set.

methods.name: _shouldTabIndex
methods.description: Accessibility enhancment.

methods.name: _padStart
methods.description: Lodash's replacements.

methods.name: _updateThemeColor
methods.description: Update theme color.

methods.name: _updateDatepickerView
methods.description: Forcefully update the view of the datepicker.

methods.name: _updateDistributedButtonInkColorCustomProp
methods.description: workaround to update custom property of distributed children until Polymer supports Native custom properties.

attributes.name: view
attributes.description:
This forcefully sets the view of the datepicker without respecting the orientation of the device.
Available options: `vertical`, `horizontal`.

attributes.name: theme
attributes.description:
This is used to set a theme for the datepicker. By default, the `light-theme` is applied.
Other options are `dark-theme`, `goog-theme`.

attributes.name: first-day-of-week
attributes.description: First Day of the week. Numbered days: `0 (Sun)` to `6 (Sat)`.

attributes.name: disable-days
attributes.description:
Arrays of days need to be disabled for selection, numbered from
`0 (Sun)` to `6 (Sat)`. Eg. weekends, `disable-days="[0, 6]"`.

attributes.name: disable-dates
attributes.description: Array of dates need to be disabled for selection.

attributes.name: min-date
attributes.description:
Minimum date for selection. Dates that are smaller than the minimum
date will be disabled for selection.

attributes.name: max-date
attributes.description:
Maximum date for selection. Dates that are larger than the maximum
date will be disabled for selection.

attributes.name: format
attributes.description: Format for the selected date. Default to `yyyy/mm/dd`. Eg. `2017/05/17`.

attributes.name: date
attributes.description: Selected date in the default format of `yyyy/mm/dd`. Eg. `2017/05/17`.

attributes.name: input-date
attributes.description: inputDate accepts a standard date string. It will reflect the change to update the internal.

attributes.name: no-animation
attributes.description: If true, no animation and transition on all elements.

attributes.name: page-entry-animation
attributes.description: Custom animation effect property when the page enters.

attributes.name: page-exit-animation
attributes.description: Custom animation effect when the page exits.

attributes.name: show-long-date
attributes.description: Selected date will be formatted into long date. Eg. `Fri, May 12 2017`.

attributes.name: invalid-date
attributes.description: To indicate the input date is in an invalid format hence no date change is applied. Only use this with inputDate property.

attributes.name: auto-update-date
attributes.description: Auto update the `date` property when changed.

attributes.name: always-reset-selected-date-on-dialog-close
attributes.description: Always reset selected date on dialog close. See https://github.com/motss/app-datepicker/issues/74.

methods.name: _updateReadOnlyDate
methods.description: Special method to update two-way binded read-only property.

methods.name: _updateReadOnlyInvalidDate
methods.description: Special method to update two-way binded read-only property.

methods.name: _updateDatepickerView
methods.description: Resize dialog to re-center the dialog when view is changed.
